title: XGBoost Training Task
name: xgboost-train-task
setup: uv pip install transformerlab xgboost scikit-learn pandas numpy matplotlib wandb;
description: A task to train an XGBoost classifier on tabular data with TransformerLab integration. Supports multiple datasets (breast_cancer, iris, synthetic) with configurable hyperparameters. Includes automatic progress tracking, model checkpointing, feature importance visualization, and comprehensive evaluation metrics.
